column5: Welcome aboard ken nice pics .

Greetings I have been watching the message board for a few months and figured its about time I jump in and introduce myself.  My name is Ken and I live with my family (wife Trish, our four adorable children Melissa, Jonathan, Michelle and Rebecca and family pooch Patches) From May to October we live on a beutiful  Island in the South Bay of Lake Nipissing, (We call it The rock)  I am so fortunate to spend summers  at the lake.  Question How do I send a few pictures with this? later Ken.
Welcome Ken! Enjoy yourself.
Welcome aboard. We have a member with the handle Nipissing that prolly isn't too far from you.
welcome
Welcome Ken,  Man am I envious, all summer spent living on Nip. Bout the only way to make this fair to the rest of us, is if you have to spend the rest of the year living in Hamilton.   Hookset.
You are a lucky man to spend such summers, Welcome Ps To add pic use photo bucket .com to down load pic's then copy and paste  the img. address on the post
I'm sure the harder he worked...the luckier he got !  Welcome aboard Ken!!
welcome! have fun on the board!
welcome aboard Ken, never fished the Nip...will have to party at yer place
Welcome Ken. In the main section open the computer help area and the first topic is FAQ's. There is a picture posting tutorial in there.
Welcome aboard, Ken.  Wayne, you got that RIGHT!
Welcome ken  from  another newbie.  Hey broad party at Ken this summer!!!
Welcome! Sounds like a great place to spend the summer!
Welcome to the board!!!  If you've been browsing for a few months, then you already know the great people on here.
Welcome
Hey and welcome!!!

I just realized who Ken is. I drive by his place most  every day in open water season. He runs a lodge in the south bay. Beautiful spot. Welcome to the board Ken. Glad to have a neighbor along with me.
Welcome Ken!   bly

Yes Ken, Welcome to OFC.  I'd love to see some pics of your little piece of heaven there.  Probably the dream of many on this board.  Check out the FAQ section on picture posting and send them on through - love to see them.
Welcome Ken...
Welcome, hope you enjoy it here!
Ken is being modest. He doesn't want  to spam. Do a google search of "Nippising Lodge". I also posted the link on one of the other recent Nippising threads. Andy
Thanks guys for the welcome. And also for the advice on posting photos.Now Mr Clemens the test. Here are a few photos of my little piece of [almost Heaven] Thanks agian Ken.      I
Welcome aboard.  Nice pictures!
Good stuff Ken. Thanks for the pics.
